entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
